welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Cartagena, Chile! Get ready to be enchanted by our beautiful colonial architecture, rich culture, and vibrant atmosphere. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in the wonders this charming city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"
